com.example.moodswing.customDataTypes

Class FirestoreUserDocCommunicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.moodswing.customDataTypes.FirestoreUserDocCommunicator

  • public class FirestoreUserDocCommunicator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class Handles all the functionality related to firestore, a go-between for the app and firestore
